content.rendered:
I’ll be talking to Mike Zagare of PPC entourage. Mike was a physical therapist in a former life. He’d started a physical therapy practice when he was about 25 years old, and it failed miserably. A coach suggested that Mike stop spinning his wheels in PT, he found Amazon FBA in 2015, began using Amazon Sponsored Products in 2016, realised that there was a vacuum in the market for a pay-per-click optimisation tool, and created PPC Entourage. The rest is history. When you sign up for PPC Entourage, be sure to use the coupon code “amazingfba” for 15% off your first year.

Interviews

279 Off Amazon Traffic Optimization with Mike Zagare Part 2 of 2
On the last episode of Amazing FBA, I sat down with Mike Zagare of PPC Entourage to talk about Amazon pay-per-click advertising, but Mike’s expertise isn’t limited to the Amazon sphere. Diversifying distribution and marketing channels is crucial for scaling your brand. Today we’ll be diving into off Amazon traffic and advertising for Amazon sellers.

278 Amazon Ads and Optimization with Mike Zagare Part 1 of 2
In 2016, Mike realised that there was a vacuum in the market for an Amazon Ads tool, and created PPC Entourage. The rest is history.
